abstract: Russian Pres Vladimir Putin calls on United States and Europe to pressure Ukrainian government to comply with cease-fire accord; contrary to opinions held by Western leaders, Putin has laid blame for failure to carry out political components of agreement on Ukraine and says Russia does not control separatists there.
lead_paragraph: President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia called on the United States and Europe to pressure the Ukrainian government to comply with a cease-fire accord that was reached in February.

headline.main: Putin Urges Western Pressure on Ukraine in Peace Effort
headline.print_headline: Putin Urges Western Pressure on Ukraine in Peace Effort

snippet: President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia called on the United States and Europe to pressure the Ukrainian government to comply with a cease-fire accord that was reached in February.
